title: The Fremennik Isles/Quick guide

properties.name: description
properties.value: Note: There is a bank on the isles so for the most part you do not have to worry about keeping all items in your inventory.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:The Fremennik Isles/Quick guide
 This quick guide has an in-depth guide here.
It contains a more detailed description of dialogue, cutscenes, and storyline.

Details[edit | edit source]

Start point Talk to Mord Gunnars in northern Rellekka.
Official difficultyExperienced
DescriptionSibling rivalry can get messy - more so when the siblings are Fremennik princes with a point to prove. The islands of Jatizso and Neitiznot were set up by two brothers who hated each other, and they have been at loggerheads ever since. But now there is a new threat from trolls in the north... Can you prove your loyalty to both brothers and save the islanders from a fate as troll food? Your skills as a Fremennik warrior, a bridge builder and... a jester will be tested on the islands.
Official lengthMedium
Requirements
  • Completion of The Fremennik Trials
  • 20 Construction (boostable)
  • The ability to kill a level 122 Troll King (Damage can be reduced) and, separately, 10 rock throwing ice trolls in a multicombat area.
Items required
  • A raw tuna (obtainable during quest, with 35 fishing or bought from the shop)
  • Either 8 tin ores, 7 pieces of coal, or 6 mithril ores (depends on your Mining level; levels 1-9 will require tin ore, 10-54 will require coal, and 55-99 require mithril ore). Note: The ores can be noted.
  • 9 ropes (obtainable during quest with 30 Crafting)
  • If the Neitiznot shield is already purchased, only 8 ropes are required.
  • A knife
  • 8 split logs (obtainable during the quest with 56 Woodcutting and an axe)
  • a Neitiznot shield (or 56 Woodcutting, a hammer and a bronze nail)
  • Yak-hide armour top and legs (or 46 Crafting, a needle and two thread)
  • 5000 coins (optional)
Recommended
  • 50 Combat level
  • 40 Agility (boostable) to optionally go to the Central Fremennik Isles mine
  • 40 for Protect from Missiles strongly recommended (43 for Protect from Melee also useful)
  • A Catspeak amulet for amusing dialogue during the initial conversation with Jatizso's king
  • Food/armour at all times (in case you get attacked by trolls on the northern island)
  • Prayer potions - as there is no altar close by
  • Good combat equipment to kill 10 low-Defence, high-Attack monsters, and one level 122
    • A melee weapon - as the Ice Troll King has very high Ranged and Magic Defence
  • A Camelot Teleport to teleport out of the cave after killing the troll king
Enemies to defeat
  • 10 Ice Trolls (level 74-82)
  • Ice Troll King (level 122)
Ironman concerns
  • 56 Woodcutting Required to make a Neitiznot shield with a hammer and one bronze nail
  • 46 Crafting Required to make yak-hide armour with a needle and a thread
  • An axe
The player will need to hand 17 items in at once.

Your skills as a Fremennik warrior, a bridge builder and... a jester will be tested on the islands.","difficulty":"Experienced","kills":"*10 [[Ice troll (disambiguation)|Ice Troll]]s ''(level 74-82)''\n*[[Ice Troll King]] ''(level 122)''","name":"The Fremennik Isles/Quick guide","start":"Talk to [[Mord Gunnars]] in northern [[Rellekka]].","length":"Medium","ironman":"*<span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Woodcutting\" data-level=\"56\">[[File:Woodcutting icon.png|21x21px|link=Woodcutting|alt=Woodcutting]] 56 </span> [[Woodcutting]] Required to make a Neitiznot shield with a [[hammer]] and one [[bronze nail]]\n*<span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Crafting\" data-level=\"46\">[[File:Crafting icon.png|21x21px|link=Crafting|alt=Crafting]] 46 </span> [[Crafting]] Required to make yak-hide armour with a [[needle]] and a [[thread]]\n*An [[axe]]\n [[File:Ultimate ironman chat badge.png]] The player will need to hand 17 items in at once.","items":"*A [[raw tuna]] (obtainable during quest, with 35 fishing or bought from the shop)\n*Either 8 [[tin ore]]s, 7 pieces of [[coal]], or 6 [[mithril ore]]s (depends on your [[Mining]] level; levels 1-9 will require tin ore, 10-54 will require coal, and 55-99 require mithril ore). '''Note:''' The ores can be noted.\n*9 [[rope]]s (obtainable during quest with <span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Crafting\" data-level=\"30\">[[File:Crafting icon.png|21x21px|link=Crafting|alt=Crafting]] 30 [[Crafting]]</span>)\n*If the [[Neitiznot shield]] is already purchased, only 8 ropes are required.\n*A [[knife]]\n*8 [[split log]]s (obtainable during the quest with 56 Woodcutting and an axe)\n*a [[Neitiznot shield]] (or 56 Woodcutting, a [[hammer]] and a [[bronze nail]])\n*[[Yak-hide armour (top)|Yak-hide armour top]] and [[Yak-hide armour (legs)|legs]] (or 46 Crafting, a [[needle]] and two [[thread]])\n*5000 [[coins]] (optional)"}

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

Note: There is a bank on the isles so for the most part you do not have to worry about keeping all items in your inventory.

The jester outfit[edit | edit source]

Items required: Raw tuna, tin/coal/mithril ores (based on mining levels, see item requirements above)

  • Talk to Mord Gunnars at the most northern dock in Rellekka to be taken to Jatizso. ( 3)…
    3Can you ferry me to Jatizso?
  • Talk to King Gjuki Sorvott IV in the checkered floor room. His cat will intervene.
  • Use the raw tuna on the King's cat.
  • Speak to the King.
  • Give him the required ores.
  • Take all four pieces of the jester outfit from the chest behind the king's throne.
  • Quick travel back to Rellekka via Mord Gunnars at the docks to the south.

The spymaster's first task[edit | edit source]

Items required: Silly jester hat, silly jester top, silly jester tights, silly jester boots

  • Quick travel to Neitiznot via Maria Gunnars on the docks next to Mord.
  • Remove anything from your weapon and shield slots and put on the Jester outfit (hat, boots, tights, top)
  • Speak with Slug Hemligssen north of the bank. ( 4•1)…
    4Free stuff please.
    1I am ready.
  • Talk to Mawnis Burowgar in the building south of the bank.
    • During the cutscene, follow the commands Mawnis gives using the right-side panel.
  • Return to Slug Hemligssen. He will give you 2500 coins. ( 1•3•2•1)…
    1Yes I have.
    3They will be ready in two days.
    2Seventeen militia have been trained.
    1There are two bridges to repair.
    ,

Bridge repairs[edit | edit source]

Items required: 8 rope, 8 split logs, a knife, one free inventory space

Optional: Food, Prayer potions, armour to tank the level 85 Ice trolls.

  • Speak to Mawnis Burowgar again without the Jester Outfit
  • Speak to Mawnis Burowgar with the ropes, split logs, and knife in your inventory with atleast one empty inventory slot.
    • If you do not have split logs, chop Arctic Pine trees until you have eight logs and use them on the Woodcutting stumps just east of the bank.
    • If you are crafting your own shield, then cut two extra logs now.
    • If you do not have any rope, kill yaks outside in the yak pen and spin their hair in southeast-most building.
  • Speak to Thakkrad to learn how to repair the bridges. ( 1)…
    1How do I repair these bridges again?

Note: Keep Protect from Missiles on at all times while repairing the bridges as any damage taken is stacked and applied after the bridge repair animation completes.

  • Travel north, across the rope bridge and repair the broken bridges on the east and west sides of the island (right-click option to repair).
  • Talk to Mawnis Burowgar.
  • Quick travel back to Rellekka via Maria Gunnars at the dock to the south-west.

The king's tax collector[edit | edit source]

Optional items: 5000 coins for black market yak trading after the quest

  • Quick travel to Jatizso via Mord.
  • Speak with King Gjuki Sorvott IV in the building west of the bank.
  • Tax the shop keepers of Jatizso:
    • Hring Hring must pay 8,000, he is in south-western most house.
    • Skuli Myrka must pay 6,000, north from Hring.
    • Vanligga Gastfrihet must pay 5,000, north from kings palace. (Offer to pay her taxes for her; this provides the capability to trade in black market yak goods after the quest.)
    • Keepa Kettilon must pay 5,000, east from Vanligga.
  • Talk to King Gjuki Sorvott IV.
  • Collect taxes from the following people for 1,000:
    • Hring Hring.
    • Raum Urda-Stein in the same house as Hring Hring.
    • Skuli Myrka.
    • Keepa Kettilon.
    • Flosi Dalksson in the same house as Keepa Kettilon.
  • Speak with King Gjuki Sorvott IV.
  • Quick travel back to Rellekka via Mord.

The spymaster's second task[edit | edit source]

Items required: Silly jester hat; Silly jester top; Silly jester tights; Silly jester boots; Yak-hide armour (top) and Yak-hide armour (legs) OR 15 coins, needle, one or more thread, and three yak hide; Neitiznot shield OR two Arctic pine logs, one bronze nail, a hammer, and rope.

  • Quick travel to Neitiznot via Maria.
  • Speak with Spymaster Slug Hemligssen again.
  • Equip only the jester outfit again.
  • Speak with Mawnis to induce another Jester cutscene.
  • Speak with Slug once again. ( 1•2•1•3)…
    1Yes, I am.
    2They are in a secluded bay, near Etceteria.
    1They will be given some potions.
    3I have been helping Neitiznot.
  • Ferry back to Rellekka and then to Jatizso.
  • Speak to King Gjuki Sorvott IV to obtain the royal decree (1 inv spot needed, otherwise you have to repeat dialogue).
  • Travel back to Neitiznot and speak with Mawnis. (Don't forget to take off the jester outfit)
  • Buy yak-hide armour (top and leggings), along with the Neitiznot shield from the Grand Exchange, or for Ironmen:
    • Kill three yaks and take their hides.
    • Have them cured by Thakkrad Sigmundson for 5gp each.
    • Use thread and needle on the hides to craft a body and leggings.
  • Speak with Mawnis, who will instruct you to craft a shield. For Ironmen:
    • Grab two Arctic pine logs, one bronze nail, a hammer, and a rope.
    • Use these items on the stump in the middle of the village.
  • Speak with Mawnis again.

The troll king[edit | edit source]

Items required: Neitiznot shield, one-handed weapon, food, Prayer potions, combat potions, emergency teleport.

Note: Use a Melee weapon as the troll king has high Magic and Ranged Defence.

This fight takes place in an instanced area.
On death, all unprotected items will be moved to a grave outside the instance. Any items left on the ground will be lost.
  • Equip the Neitiznot shield and combat items to fight the Ice Troll King.
  • Equipping it is actually not required to enter the cave, or to fight the king, but will heavily reduce damage, and thus is highly recommended.

Note: This is a multi-combat zone. Melee and Ranged Ice Trolls will attack you.

Make sure to equip the Neitiznot shield.

  • Use Protect from Melee while running to the east side cave entrance of the farthest north isle.
  • Enter the cave to start a cutscene.
    • Talk to Bork Sigmundson to obtain some food, prayer pots, and strength pots during battle.
  • Kill ten trolls, you will see a message saying "You have defeated enough trolls to attack the King."
  • Turn on Protect from Missiles before crossing the bridge.
  • Turn on Protect from Magic for the duration of the fight. Kill the troll king. DO NOT use Protect from Melee because King will use the long distance attack as Dad does.
  • Decapitate the troll king's corpse.
  • Return to Mawnis Burowgar.

Optional: Make sure to claim the prayer potions from Bork Sigmundson at the entrance.

Quest complete!

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • 1 Quest point
  • 5,000 Construction experience
  • 5,000 Crafting experience
  • 10,000 Woodcutting experience
  • Two lots of 10,000 Combat experience (choose between Strength, Attack, Defence or Hitpoints).
  • A Fremennik royal helm known as the helm of neitiznot, which is the equivalent of a berserker helm with a +3 Prayer bonus, slightly better Magic and crush Defence, and no negative bonuses. If a player loses the helm, they can talk to Mawnis Burowgar to buy another one for 50,000 coins.
  • Access to Arctic Pine trees.
  • Access to an island with a runite rock north-east of Neitiznot, which also has seven (7) coal rocks nearby.
  • Access to the Jatizso mine, which contains up to adamantite rocks.
  • Around 20,000 coins in assorted rewards during quest.
  • The banks in Neitiznot and Jatizso are close to water, range, furnace, fishing spots, mining ores; a spinning wheel is also nearby.
  • If the jester outfit is lost, a player can retrieve another one from the chest behind King Gjuki Sorvott IV's throne.
  • Learn the ability to create yak-hide armour and Neitiznot shields.
  • The Contraband Yak Produce shop is available on Jatizso if a player refunds the 5,000 coin tax to Vanligga Gastfrihet, who is north of the king.

Required for completing[edit | edit source]

  • The Fremennik Exiles

{{External|rs}}
{{Quick Guide}}

==Details==
{{Quest details page|The Fremennik Isles}}

==Walkthrough==
'''Note''': ''There is a bank on the isles so for the most part you do not have to worry about keeping all items in your inventory.''
===The jester outfit===
'''Items required''': ''[[Raw tuna]], [[Tin ore|tin]]/[[coal]]/[[Mithril ore|mithril]] ores (based on mining levels, see item requirements above)''
{{Checklist|*Talk to [[Mord Gunnars]] at the most northern dock in [[Rellekka]] to be taken to [[Jatizso]]. {{Chat option|3Can you ferry me to Jatizso?}}
*Talk to [[King Gjuki Sorvott IV]] in the checkered floor room. [[HRH Hrafn|His cat]] will intervene.
*Use the raw tuna on the King's cat.
*Speak to the King.
*Give him the required ores.
*Take all four pieces of the jester outfit from the chest behind the king's throne.
*Quick travel back to Rellekka via Mord Gunnars at the docks to the south.
}}
===The spymaster's first task===
'''Items required''': ''Silly jester hat, silly jester top, silly jester tights, silly jester boots''
{{Checklist|
*Quick travel to [[Neitiznot]] via [[Maria Gunnars]] on the docks next to Mord.
*Remove anything from your weapon and shield slots and put on the Jester outfit (hat, boots, tights, top)
*Speak with [[Slug Hemligssen]] north of the bank. {{Chat option|4Free stuff please.|1I am ready.}}
*Talk to [[Mawnis Burowgar]] in the building south of the bank.
**During the cutscene, follow the commands Mawnis gives using the right-side panel.
*Return to Slug Hemligssen. He will give you 2500 coins. {{Chat option|1Yes I have.|3They will be ready in two days.|2Seventeen militia have been trained.|1There are two bridges to repair.}},
}}

===Bridge repairs===
'''Items required''': ''8 [[rope]], 8 [[split log]]s, a [[knife]], one free inventory space''

'''Optional''': ''Food, [[Prayer potions]], armour to tank the level 85 Ice trolls.''
{{Checklist|
*Speak to [[Mawnis Burowgar]] again without the Jester Outfit
*Speak to Mawnis Burowgar with the ropes, split logs, and knife in your inventory with atleast one empty inventory slot.
**If you do not have split logs, chop Arctic Pine trees until you have eight logs and use them on the Woodcutting stumps just east of the bank.
**If you are crafting your own shield, then cut two extra logs now.
**If you do not have any rope, kill [[yak]]s outside in the yak pen and spin their [[hair]] in southeast-most building.
*Speak to [[Thakkrad]] to learn how to repair the bridges. {{Chat option|1How do I repair these bridges again?|}}
}}
'''Note''': ''Keep Protect from Missiles on at all times while repairing the bridges as any damage taken is stacked and applied after the bridge repair animation completes.''
{{Checklist|
*Travel north, across the rope bridge and repair the broken bridges on the east and west sides of the island (right-click option to repair).
*Talk to Mawnis Burowgar.
*Quick travel back to Rellekka via [[Maria Gunnars]] at the dock to the south-west.
}}

===The king's tax collector===
'''Optional items''': ''5000 [[coins]] for black market yak trading after the quest''
{{Checklist|
*Quick travel to [[Jatizso]] via [[Mord]].
*Speak with [[King Gjuki Sorvott IV]] in the building west of the bank.
*Tax the shop keepers of Jatizso:
**[[Hring Hring]] must pay 8,000, he is in south-western most house.
**[[Skuli Myrka]] must pay 6,000, north from Hring.
**[[Vanligga Gastfrihet]] must pay 5,000, north from kings palace. ''(Offer to pay her taxes for her; this provides the capability to trade in black market yak goods after the quest.)''
**[[Keepa Kettilon]] must pay 5,000, east from Vanligga.
*Talk to King Gjuki Sorvott IV.
*Collect taxes from the following people for 1,000:
**Hring Hring.
**[[Raum Urda-Stein]] in the same house as Hring Hring.
**Skuli Myrka.
**Keepa Kettilon.
**[[Flosi Dalksson]] in the same house as Keepa Kettilon.
*Speak with King Gjuki Sorvott IV.
*Quick travel back to [[Rellekka]] via Mord.
}}

===The spymaster's second task===
'''Items required''': ''[[Silly jester hat]]; [[Silly jester top]]; [[Silly jester tights]]; [[Silly jester boots]]; [[Yak-hide armour (top)]] and [[Yak-hide armour (legs)]] OR 15 [[coins]], [[needle]], one or more [[thread]], and three [[yak hide]]; [[Neitiznot shield]] OR two [[Arctic pine logs]], one [[bronze nail]], a [[hammer]], and [[rope]].''
{{Checklist|
*Quick travel to [[Neitiznot]] via [[Maria]].
*Speak with Spymaster [[Slug Hemligssen]] again.
*Equip only the jester outfit again.
*Speak with [[Mawnis]] to induce another Jester cutscene.
*Speak with Slug once again. {{Chat option|1Yes, I am.|2They are in a secluded bay, near Etceteria.|1They will be given some potions.|3I have been helping Neitiznot.}}
*Ferry back to [[Rellekka]] and then to [[Jatizso]].
*Speak to [[King Gjuki Sorvott IV]] to obtain the [[royal decree]] (1 inv spot needed, otherwise you have to repeat dialogue).
*Travel back to Neitiznot and speak with Mawnis. (Don't forget to take off the jester outfit)
*Buy [[yak-hide armour]] (top and leggings), along with the [[Neitiznot shield]] from the Grand Exchange, or for Ironmen:
**Kill three [[yak]]s and take their hides.
**Have them cured by [[Thakkrad Sigmundson]] for 5gp each.
**Use thread and needle on the hides to craft a body and leggings.
*Speak with Mawnis, who will instruct you to craft a shield. For Ironmen:
**Grab two [[Arctic pine logs]], one [[bronze nail]], a hammer, and a rope.
**Use these items on the stump in the middle of the village.
*Speak with Mawnis again.
}}

===The troll king===
'''Items required''': ''[[Neitiznot shield]], one-handed weapon, food, [[Prayer potions]], combat potions, emergency teleport.''

'''Note''': '''''Use a Melee weapon''''' as ''the troll king has high Magic and Ranged Defence.
{{Instance}}
{{Checklist|
*Equip the [[Neitiznot shield]] and combat items to fight the [[Ice Troll King]].}}
*Equipping it is actually not required to enter the cave, or to fight the king, but will heavily reduce damage, and thus is highly recommended.

'''Note''': This is a '''multi-combat zone. Melee and Ranged Ice Trolls will attack you.'''
{{Checklist|Make sure to equip the Neitiznot shield.
*Use Protect from Melee while running to the east side cave entrance of the farthest north isle.
*Enter the cave to start a cutscene.
**Talk to [[Bork Sigmundson]] to obtain some food, prayer pots, and strength pots during battle.
*Kill ten trolls, you will see a message saying ''"You have defeated enough trolls to attack the King."''
*Turn on Protect from Missiles before crossing the bridge.
*Turn on Protect from Magic for the duration of the fight. Kill the troll king. DO NOT use Protect from Melee because King will use the long distance attack as [[Dad]] does.
*Decapitate the troll king's corpse.
*Return to [[Mawnis Burowgar]].
Optional: Make sure to claim the prayer potions from Bork Sigmundson at the entrance.}}
'''''Quest complete!'''''
